text: Kana (Muhammad (SAW)) mukasamubetsera (hazvina mhaka), nokuti zvirokwazvo Allah vakamubetsera apo vasingatendi vakamutandanisa, ari umwe wevaviri; apo paive vose (Muhammad (SAW) na Abu Bakr (RA)) mubako, akati kune umwe wake (Abu Bakr (RA)): “Usatye! Zvirokwazvo, Allah vanesu.” Zvino Allah vakatumira runyararo (kugadzikana) kwaari, uye vakamusimbisa nemauto (ngirozi) vamusina kuvaona, uye vakabva vadzikisira mashoko evasingatendi, apo shoko raAllah rakave pamusoro; uye Allah ndivo mukuru-kuru, vane hungwaru hwose
